itemDescription: relation of the British royal family; second cousin of Elizabeth II

wikipedia_page.main:
Lady Mary Ilona Margaret Whitley (née Cambridge; 24 September 1924 – 13 December 1999) was a relative 
of the British Royal Family. The only child of the 2nd Marquess of Cambridge, she was a second cousin of Queen Elizabeth II.

link_mentions.page: Wedding of Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson
response: * Lady Mary Whitley, the groom's second cousin, once removed
